thread.title: AllianceBernstein Closed-End Funds Announce Distribution Rates

author: cnbc.com
title: AllianceBernstein Closed-End Funds Announce Distribution Rates

organizations.name: alliance california municipal income fund, inc.
alliancebernstein national municipal income fund, inc.

text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 16, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- The AllianceBernstein Closed-End Funds declared the following distributions today:
FUND NAME AND DISTRIBUTIONS
EX-DATE
RECORD DATE
PAYMENT DATE
AllianceBernstein Global High Income Fund, Inc. (NYSE: AWF)
03/01/2018
03/02/2018
03/16/2018
$0.0699 per share of investment income
AllianceBernstein National Municipal Income Fund, Inc. (NYSE: AFB)
03/01/2018
03/02/2018
03/16/2018
$0.04581 per share of investment income
Alliance California Municipal Income Fund, Inc. (NYSE: AKP)
03/01/2018
03/02/2018
03/16/2018
$0.04208 per share of investment income
The Funds are managed by AllianceBernstein L.P.
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/alliancebernstein-closed-end-funds-announce-distribution-rates-300600223.html
SOURCE AllianceBernstein Closed-End Funds
